nodes.text: At some point after the conquest of the planet of Begeren in 3678 BBY by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War with the Republic, a group of natives formed a terrorist cell that resisted the Imperial occupation. However, Lassicar, a son of two of the cell's members, exposed the cell's existence to Imperial Moff Harvus sometime before the end of the war in 3653 BBY, resulting in the execution of the group's members.
The terrorist cell was briefly mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the in-game Codex entry for Guardsman Lassicar.
